caption.title: PCA graphs of bioclimate variables for studied species.
caption.p: PCA graphs displaying contribution of climate variables for niche space for every species studied. a) Berberis trifoliolata. b) Ephedra compacta. c) Leucophyllum laevigatum. d) Lindleya mespiloides. d) Setchellanthus caeruleus.
Click here for additional data file.
